content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nI received a command to browse a website about martial arts, but the website did not provide any information about resources to learn about martial arts. The website was about various religions and beliefs. I executed a shell command to search for martial arts resources on Google using Firefox.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb''\nSTDERR:\nb'Error: no DISPLAY environment variable specified\\n'"}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "lynx -dump \'https://www.google.com/search?q=martial+arts+resources\' > martial_arts_resources.txt"}}}'}]
"""
